meanings.definition: A large, impressive house or building.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy family lived in grand mansions.
meanings.sent2: The mansions along the street were all beautifully designed.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse dreamed of living in a mansion made of cheese.
meanings.sent4: The mansion of knowledge held the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The haunted mansion loomed over the town, casting a shadow of mystery.

meanings.sent1: The cozy mansions in the neighborhood were filled with laughter.
meanings.sent2: She invited her friends over to her mansion for a movie night.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's treehouse was the envy of all the other forest mansions.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a mansion of love, open to all who needed shelter.
meanings.sent5: The mansion of dreams held the key to endless possibilities.
